WorkItem.Description: Those the plan include the general use of the content property when using ribbon components. Just wondering since the content property does not work on the RibbonButton.

Comments.Message: Thanks for reporting this.  We've recorded this issue in our bug database and it will be fixed in an upcoming release.  Thanks!

To follow up, the team discussed this bug and decided that it was By Design, since the Content property on a typical Button can be anything (text, image, etc.), whereas the RibbonButton has a specific layout which must be followed according to the guidelines, which requires you to use the LabelTitle, Small/LargeImageSource, etc. properties to achieve the correct look.  Therefore, our current plan is to ignore the Content property on all Ribbon controls.
